it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.leaderCard

Class LeaderCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.leaderCard.LeaderCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the leader cards of the game. This kind of card has one requirement to satisfy and has a once a time effect or a permanent effect. Player can enable the card or can discard it
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • LeaderCard

        public LeaderCard(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  LeaderRequirements requirements,
                  Effect onceARoundEffect,
                  Effect permanentEffect,
                  CouncilObtain effect)
        Constructor of a leader card
        Parameters:
        name - The name to give to the leader card
        description - A brief description of the card
        requirements - A LeaderRequirements object to check the requirements of the leader card
        onceARoundEffect - The effect the player can enable each round
        permanentEffect - An effect that the player can enable one time and it's valid for the entire match
        effect - The effect to give to the player when he discard this card
